comment: Mrs. Fancher is a wonderful lady! I highly recommend taking her if you can. She is very helpful. She will correct you when correction is needed but she never makes you feel inadequate. She loves her students and it is apparent each and every day. Work hard and you will be okay.

Actually took her in high school, so didn't really teach me anything new, but classmates found her extremely helpful. Really nice & gives you lots of opportunities to improve. Might be better for those just entering art, if you want more of a challenge go elsewhere, but I love Mrs. Fancher & she does care for her students. Live models at end-loved!

She is an incredible teacher!  She's caring and LOVES what she does!  The first part of the semester is extremely busy, but as long as you're giving a good faith effort, she is EXTREMELY understanding!!  Perfect teacher for a new art student!!
Excellent professor.  She really knows what she is talking about.  She is extremely helpful and caring.  If you put forth effort and attend class, you can make a good grade.

i'm a terrible drawer. honestly i had not drawn once before her class. she is one of the most understanding, laid back, helpful teachers i've had. i may suck but i'm getting better. she def. makes you feel comfortable enough to be confident no matter what your skill level. excellent if you're a begi
She is fair, easy, and clear.  The class is quite simple and she won't keep you the full class time.  She covers the meat and potatoes.
SHE WAS AMAZING. DRAWING WAS NEVER MY FORTE AND WITH HER I LEARNED SO MUCH.
Nice teacher, easy class, but the lectures are BORING! Easy grade if you don't fall asleep.
